title: How UGC Is Extending the Lifespan of Games with Uri Marchand, CEO of Overwolf

rawLines.text: [Music]
Uri Marshand, welcome to the podcast.
Thank you. Thank you for having me.
Welcome back. I would say you've been
here before. Indeed. I have been here uh
with the wonderful Lee uh some time ago
after we done the Tavix acquisition.
That was that was a fun uh episode.
Yeah. And you're still in the same place
with the wooden background. So I brought
my wooden background just to uh just to
counter it. Uh balanced. Thank you.
Yeah, just exactly. So, talking about
playfields, Overwolf sits at the

Overwolf is the guild for in-game

That's why the guild part. And with this
new profession, we're helping people
creating mods or apps or private servers

Unity or Unreal are engines that help

years go
